nodes.text: Imperial identification cards were used to identify the various beings of the Sith Empire. An Imperial identification card was needed to purchase items in Larvit's store.
In 3950 BBY when Meetra Surik came to Larvit's store to convert her diamonds into the local currency he asked her to present her Imperial identification card.
The Imperial identification card of the Sith Empire was first mentioned in Drew Karpyshyn's novel The Old Republic: Revan, which was released on November 15, 2011.
